title: Liverpool transfer news and rumours: Salomon Rondon
description: All the latest Liverpool transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Thursday, January 25.
content: Liverpool and Everton could go head to head for West Brom striker Salomon Rondon this month in a £15m deal, according to The Sun.Meanwhile, Charlton defender Ezri Konsa will stay at the Valley despite interest from Liverpool, according to the Daily Mail.The report suggests the Reds were unwilling to match the League One club's £5m valuation of the player.Liverpool have also missed out on 18-year-old Zinho Vanheusden, according to Sky in Italy.Finally, former Liverpool winger Albert Riera has announced his retirement from professional football.The 35-year-old, who also played for Manchester City and Watford in England, announced on social media that he has hung up his boots.In a post on his @11RIERA11 Twitter account, he said: "Right time to say BYE as a player. Thanks to the clubs and supporters that have been along this way with me from 2001 till today. Proud and thankful for the way we have been together during 17 years. Now time to look forward and impatient for my new step! #thanks #football"
